channel.title: Laylatul Qadr on Ilm Fruits
channel.description: Recent content in Laylatul Qadr on Ilm Fruits

item.title: Plan for the Last 10 Nights of Ramadan
item.description: Ramadan is coming to a close. Like the last half-kilometer of a 10km race, the finish-line is in sight. This is the time to pull out all the stops and to sprint, flat-out. This is the time when Laylatul-Qadar, the night where deeds are multiplied by more than one thousand, hides. Are you ready for it? Maybe you felt like Ramadan breezed by. Maybe you felt like you didn’t do enough.
